alert.note: Alert for Hawkins; Sullivan (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 8:38AM CST until February 25 at 11:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee...Virginia... North Fork Holston River Near Gate City VA affecting Sullivan, Hawkins and Scott Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fork Holston River near Gate City VA. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Water begins to cover some low lying county roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EST Friday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1200 AM EST.
